text: Ezɨ kɨ datɨrɨghɨn bar akonge. Kɨ fo, ia oseme, ezɨ kɨ bizir kam bagha bar akongezir puvatɨ. Kɨ fo, ian osɨmtɨzim ko aghumsɨzim ia gamizɨ, ia uan navibagh ira, ezɨ kɨ bizir kam bagha bar akonge. Kɨ fo, God uabɨ ia gamizɨ, ian naviba osemegha aghumsɨki. Ezɨ en mɨgɨrɨgɨar kataba bar ian navibagh asɨghasɨghizir puvatɨ.
